message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $120.  I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the item, but I can only pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the price I offered is already quite fair. Could you meet me halfway at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe $90 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
